content: **knitted basic jacket in drops melody the piece is worked bottom up with stocking stitch and v-neck sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-098 yarn group d ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 250-250-300-300-350-400 g colour 02 fog **buttons** drops buttons no 522 4 items in all sizes **needles** drops circular needle size 7 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge ** 13 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
